turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I would like to place a order for a pizza from a new pizzeria called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! I can help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what type of pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, I would like four large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's important that they all have a gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what would you like on the first one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, the first one I would like it to be a ham and pineapple with olives and extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The second one I would like it to be a Specialty Pizza, a Philly Steak and Cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I would like that to have extra parmesan cheese at it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Along with red pepper flakes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OKay, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, what about number 3?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well number three and number four, I would like them both to be the same. I want pepperoni and beef topping and I want that with extra cheese and green and black olives on both pizza number three and number four. And also make sure that they are gluten free with the crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay sure! one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I got 4 large pizzas, all with gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the 1st one with ham and pineapple and black olives and extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the 2nd one, is a Philly steak and cheese, with extra parmesan and added hot crushed peppers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and the 3rd and 4th are pepperoni and ground beef, with extra cheese and olives.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sound quite right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: please note, they only have black olives.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Can you make it a double black olives, then?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On both of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure! extra black olives on both.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: not a problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright! Is that all for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you confirm with me that all four of those specifically are the glutten free crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, all 4 pizzas are with gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, you got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Awesome! let me grab you the total, one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No problem.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total for those 4 large pizzas on gluten free crust will be $57.33, is that okay?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while I send your order to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order is in the works and should be ready for pickup in 40 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, you got it. Awesome. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're very welcome.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye bye!
